name: Taj Mahal
description: Authentic North Indian cuisine in a luxurious setting with royal Mughal ambiance
specialties: Butter Chicken, Dal Makhani, Naan, Biryani
features: Live music, Private dining rooms, Valet parking, Wine cellar
text_for_embedding: Taj Mahal is a North Indian restaurant in Indiranagar with Premium pricing and Fine Dining ambiance. It offers authentic North Indian cuisine in a luxurious setting with royal Mughal ambiance. Specialties include Butter Chicken, Dal Makhani, Naan, and Biryani. Dietary options available are Vegetarian, Vegan, and Gluten-free. Features include Live music, Private dining rooms, Valet parking, and Wine cellar.
